name: modifyNonEmptyHead
description:
Apply a function to the head, creating a new `NonEmptyReadonlyArray`.
*Example
documentation:
Apply a function to the head, creating a new `NonEmptyReadonlyArray`.
*Example**

```ts
import { Array } from "effect"

const result = Array.modifyNonEmptyHead([1, 2, 3], n => n * 10)
console.log(result) // [10, 2, 3]
```
